MESSAGES.404:
Ouh sorry,

MESSAGES.500:
Something went wrong,

MESSAGES.share_empty: The object can not be loaded.

DETAILS.share_expired: The shared link has expired or has been terminated by the owner of the material.
DETAILS.share_file_deleted: The shared link points to an object which has been deleted. Please contact the author.
DETAILS.share_empty: The link points to an incompatible file or a file without content.
DETAILS.usage_missing: The element could not be accessed because the share was removed for the current context. Please contact the author of the page you came from
DETAILS.INVALID: Wenn dieser Fehler erneut auftritt, kontaktieren Sie bitte den Betreiber des Systems
DETAILS.403: The access to the given resource is restricted.
